author: sly_gryphon
content:
Addresses like the withrdrawal value, and the validator pubkey should probably also have checksum built in from day 1 -- there is an open issue in the spec github about it.

I know pubkeys in particular should be automated (as the secret is needed to sign), but it just sets a good precendence to have even a simple checksum / CRC included in the value (if not a full-blown error detection like BCH).
